full_output.summary: Proactive CSE undergraduate skilled in frontend web development with skills in ReactJS, SQL, Javascript, C++. Experienced in designing and implementing user-friendly web interfaces. Passionate about problem-solving and learning new technologies. Seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative projects and grow within a dynamic environment.

projects.name: Showflix
projects.description: Showflix is a streaming website similar to Netflix, showcasing trending content worldwide and offering genre-based and content-specific recommendations. The search engine is integrated through API calls, providing results based on the searched items.

projects.name: Restaurant Billing System using Python
projects.description: Developed a digital billing system aimed at minimizing manual errors in bill preparation and providing customers with accurate, digital invoices. Implemented automated billing processes to optimize operations, reduce errors, and enhance overall efficiency in customer transactions.

projects.name: Sudoku Solver using JavaScript, CSS, HTML
projects.description: A JavaScript implementation of a Sudoku game, including a backtracking algorithm solver.

projects.name: Unraveling Plant Diseases: CNN-Based Leaf Spot Recognition with Inception-v3
projects.description: Leveraged the powerful CNN Inception V3 model for precise plant disease prediction and management, showcasing cutting-edge AI capabilities. Curated an extensive database and conducted rigorous accuracy testing, ensuring high reliability and performance. Achieved a remarkable 74% accuracy rate, enabling effective disease detection and offering actionable treatment recommendations, revolutionizing agriculture industry practices.

experiences.description: Completed Salesforce Trailhead modules covering Salesforce Fundamentals, Organizational Setup, Relationship and Process Automation, Types of Flows and Security, Apex, Testing and Debugging, VS Code Setup and CLI Setup, and Lightning Web Components (LWC) and API, enhancing my proficiency in Salesforce development.
